Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-58060 affecting package cups for versions less than 2.4.13-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-58060 affecting package cups for versions less than 2.4.13-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cups is earlier than 2.4.13-1, affected by CVE-2025-58060
